name: Berryman Teak Buffet Sideboard
description:
Absolutely stunning and rare Berryman buffet. Featuring teak veneer, solid teak edging and solid timber legs. Designed by Johannes Andersen, and built under license in Australia by Berryman.

Plenty of storage options, shelves on either side are height adjustable.  Drawers and Tambour doors (no more open doors getting in the way) all slide smoothly. Interior is in great condition.

It is in superb condition. The timber has been cleaned, lightly sanded and re-sealed, and has come up tops (only very minimal signs of wear)! There has been a repair to the top drawer handle. Overall it presents beautifully, and is definitely a piece that you would be very proud to own and use.

Questions and viewings are welcome, and encouraged.

Dimensions are: 227cm long, 46cm deep and 82cm high.

name: Danish Low Back Leather Armchair
description:
Beautiful low back Danish leather armchair. 
A stunning low back leather Danish armchair (circa 1960's) with solid rosewood legs.

This chair is solid and extremely comfortable and supportive. It is in excellent condition - only very minor signs of wear. The chair is black with leather seat cushions and vinyl/leather composite frame/outer chair.

Dimensions are: TBA.

Let me know if you are keen.

name: Fog & Morup Pendant Lamp Shade
description:
A stunning iconic retro Fog & Morup pendant lamp shade, with chrome top and a white underside. The lights are danish modernism at it peak and look stunning wherever they are place ie the dining table over a kitchen island or low over a side/reading table.

It is in great condition, there are signs of wear, all consistent with age and use. Namely some marks etc on the underside and very minor pitting on the chrome - see pictures. Would need to be wired in by an electrician. Overall it presents beautifully ..... a striking bit of Mid Century Danish bling!

Questions and viewings are welcome, and encouraged.

Dimensions are: 60cm diameter.

Can be collected from Beacon Hill, delivery to the Sydney metro area is possible for a fee - please check with me prior to bidding. Couriers are welcome.

name: Vatne Falcon Chair
description:
A black leather low back Vatne Falcon chair, designed by Sigurd Resell. A very comfy and stylish seat.

This is a great looking chair. There are minor signs of use/wear. The black leather (has been cleaned and conditioned) is in good condition, there are signs of wear/use. There is some wear to the canvas that backs onto the leather, a small tear has appeared. At some point there has been a repair made to the canvas alongside the upper buckles . The chair has brand new foam. The black frame is in great condition with only minor signs of wear, and has been cleaned and re-sealed. The canvas seat/sling is in good condition. Overall it presents beautifully and it is very very comfortable and supportive. 

Questions and viewings are welcome, and encouraged.

Dimensions are: TBA.

Can be collected from Beacon Hill, delivery to the Sydney metro area is possible for a fee. Couriers are welcome.

name: TH Brown Armchairs
description:
A beautiful pair of sculptural armchairs (circa 1960's - manufacturer unknown). Clearly modeled from Nanna Ditzel's Sausage chair (1956), possibly produced by T H Brown, under licence? Very supportive, comfortable and stylish.

This is a stunning set of retro chairs. The solid blackwood timber legs have been cleaned and re-sealed. The seats have been professionally upholstered in a Kvadrat royal purple Danish wool. Overall they present beautifully, and are definitely a set you would be very pleased to own and use......and show off!

Questions and viewings are welcome, and encouraged.

Dimensions are: TBA.

Can be collected from Beacon Hill, delivery to the Sydney metro area is possible for a fee. Couriers are welcome.
